SplitEntry.title: Select Configuration
SplitEntry.enterpriseDesc: Strategic SaaS ecosystems bridging fragmented corporate infrastructure into single-source intelligence.
SplitEntry.residentialDesc: Proactive environment orchestration delivering absolute privacy and silent sophistication to the modern home.

TechHero.status: Status: Private Beta (v0.9) // Powered by Google Cloud
TechHero.title: The Sovereign OS for Fragmented IoT.
TechHero.description: Vylera unifies disparate hardware ecosystems (Tuya, Zigbee, Matter) into a single, intelligent Neural Core. Powered by Google Vertex AI.

ProblemSolution.title: WHY VYLERA?
ProblemSolution.problemDesc: Smart home hardware is fragmented. Devices from different manufacturers (e.g., Tuya, Xiaomi) operate in isolated data silos, locking telemetry in foreign clouds.
ProblemSolution.solutionDesc: Vylera acts as the Universal Interoperability Bridge. We process device signals locally on the Edge, allowing mixed-brand hardware to function as a single, privacy-first organism—without external cloud dependencies.

Features.feature1Desc: Anticipates needs via Privacy-First Observation. We process locally, ensuring your data never leaves the sanctuary.
Features.feature2Desc: Hardware Agnostic (Tuya/Zigbee). We provide the Brain, connecting disparate devices into a single coherent organism.
Features.feature3Desc: Standard American English core with Hyper-Regional fine-tuning (e.g., Ammani, Jaksel). Conversational, not robotic.
Features.spec2Value: Google Vertex AI, Vision API, Sentiment Vectorization

Manifesto.title: The Invisible Era:
Manifesto.subtitle: A Vylera Manifesto.
Manifesto.sec1Desc: Why do we still 'manage' our homes? True intelligence shouldn't require an app or a voice command. Vylera observes the subtle rhythms of your life—a tired gait, a frustrated sigh—and responds before you ask.
Manifesto.sec2Desc: Vylera AI bridges the gap between generic hardware and elite intelligence. By linking a simple Tuya PIR sensor with a Door Cam and a Google-powered Thermostat, we create a 'Sensory Net'. The more devices you add, the more 'context' Vylera AI gains, turning fragmented gadgets into a unified, sentient ecosystem.
Manifesto.sec3Desc: Ethical AI means local-first logic. Your home’s 'eyes' are for your benefit alone. We process micro-expressions into anonymous vectors, ensuring your sanctuary remains yours.
Manifesto.sec4Desc: We leverage the world's most advanced AI infrastructure—Google Vertex AI—to give ordinary electronics a human-level understanding of comfort and safety.

IntelligenceLayer.headerDesc: Powered by the Vylera AI—Our proprietary ingestion engine that tames raw IoT telemetry into sentient context.
IntelligenceLayer.mascotBubble: "I\'ve optimized the kitchen lights for your cooking vibe. Shall I play some Lofi?"
IntelligenceLayer.scenario0Desc: The system waits for an event to complete before flagging it. Usually too late to act.
IntelligenceLayer.scenario1Desc: Anticipates intent before the user reaches the threshold. Frictionless entry when it matters most.
IntelligenceLayer.feedbackDesc: System auto-corrects based on sentiment analysis. If a user scowls at an automation, our Vision API logs 'Negative Sentiment' and re-weights the probability model instantly.

Technology.title:
Hybrid-Edge
Processing.
Technology.desc1: Your home is a sanctuary, not a data mine. Vylera processes strictly on-device using a local LLM neural fabric.
Technology.desc2: Raw data never leaves the premises. Only "Intent Vectors"—anonymized and stripped of context—cross the firewall for complex query resolution.

Pipeline.title: The Vylera Translation Engine
Pipeline.subtitle: Select a hardware input to visualize the transformation from "Dumb Data" to "Sentient Action."

Architecture.subtitle: System Architecture
Architecture.title: The Edge-to-Core Pipeline
Architecture.feature1Desc: 0.0ms Latency. Visual and audio data formats are converted to tensors instantly on the local gateway, isolating raw data from the external network.
Architecture.feature2Desc: Leveraging distributed compute units, high-level intent is extracted from anonymized vector streams, allowing Vylera to "understand" context without "seeing" the home.
Architecture.outcomeQuote: "Ad-Free Ambient Response via YouTube Premium Integration for seamless auditory environments."

SystemHealth.subtitle: System Architecture
SystemHealth.title: The Vylera Neural Mesh
SystemHealth.node2Desc: High-velocity data streaming + Sanctuary Protocol (Local Vectorization).
SystemHealth.node3Desc: Vertex AI + Gemini 3 Pro + Memory Bank.
SystemHealth.footerQuote: "Our architecture utilizes Asynchronous Memory Fact Extraction. Vylera doesn't just process data; it builds a persistent cultural profile for every inhabitant, ensuring 100% 'Unggah-ungguh' compliance."

Security.subtitle: The Sanctuary Protocol
Security.title:
Privacy by Design.
Not by Policy.
Security.feature1Desc: Vylera does NOT store images or audio. Raw sensor data is converted into mathematical vectors (tensors) LOCALLY on the edge. Only these abstract vectors reach our logic core.
Security.feature2Desc: All telemetry data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 and transmitted via TLS 1.3. Your home’s behavioral signature looks like static to the outside world.
Security.feature3Desc: We cannot see into your home. Our system only sees anonymized "Intent Triggers" (e.g., "Lights: ON"). We have no access to the raw visual or audio feed.

EarlyAccess.subtitle: Early Access
EarlyAccess.title: Join the Neural Network
EarlyAccess.desc: Vylera is currently inviting select residential users to the Private Beta. Experience the first proactive AI OS for your home.

Roadmap.title: Development Timeline
Roadmap.subtitle: The Road to Sentience
Roadmap.q1Desc: Vylera AI & Sanctuary Protocol. Local vectorization of 15+ hardware standards (Zigbee, Matter, Tuya) into a unified privacy-first local stream.
Roadmap.q2Desc: Deployment of Vertex AI feedback loops. System begins quantizing vocal tone and facial micro-expressions to determine automation success rates.
Roadmap.q3Desc: Gait analysis integration. Vylera learns to distinguish occupants by footsteps and movement patterns, enabling intent-based proactive entry.
Roadmap.q4Desc: Full hardware agnosticism and Ambient OS API launch. Opening the neural core for third-party context-aware plugin development.

WhitePaper.subtitle: Technical White Paper
WhitePaper.title: Vylera-1: A Foundation Model for Ambient Intelligence.
WhitePaper.sec1Desc: Traditional smart homes suffer from cognitive friction. The requirement to speak a command ("Hey Google") or navigate an app introduces a latency of intent. Vylera eliminates this by acting on context, not instruction.
WhitePaper.sec2Item1: Ingestion: Multi-protocol bridge (MQTT, Zigbee, Matter) unifying disparate hardware.
WhitePaper.sec2Item2: Perception: Real-time gait analysis & facial sentiment extraction via Vertex AI.
WhitePaper.sec2Item3: Action: Predictive state changes. The home acts before you ask.
WhitePaper.sec3Desc: We operate on a "Vector-Only" basis. Visual data is converted to mathematical abstractions (tensors) locally. No raw images ever leave the premises or touch the cloud.
WhitePaper.log7: [14:20:04] SANCTUARY: Flushing VRAM. No images stored.

InvestorRelations.title:
Building Indonesia's
Sovereign AI Infrastructure.
InvestorRelations.tooltipDesc: A nod to the 'Merah Putih' (Red & White) flag, symbolizing our commitment to the Indonesia BerdAIa 2045 vision.
InvestorRelations.desc: Vylera Labs is a flagship "Indonesia BerdAIa" initiative, designed to provide the Agentic AI layer for 60M+ Indonesian households. By utilizing the Jakarta Cloud Region (asia-southeast2), we ensure 100% Data Sovereignty and compliance with the 2026 National AI Roadmap.
InvestorRelations.tableR3C3: 4 Months (Bundled Incentives)
InvestorRelations.ctaDesc: Vylera Labs is currently raising a $1.5M Seed round to scale local manufacturing and Jakarta-region infrastructure.

EnterpriseProducts.subtitle: Strategic Intelligence Suite
EnterpriseProducts.title: Enterprise SaaS Lineup
EnterpriseProducts.desc: A proprietary ecosystem of deep-tech solutions engineered to optimize, automate, and dominate across every sector of corporate architecture.

products.posDesc: Transforms transactions into real-time consumer behavior analytics and inventory foresight.
products.hrDesc: Unifies payroll, performance, and recruitment into a frictionless, AI-optimized employee lifecycle.
products.fmsDesc: Optimizes logistics by embedding AI into route planning, fuel management, and predictive maintenance.
products.webDesc: Deploys self-optimizing, AI-driven digital platforms designed for maximum conversion and user intent.
products.noteDesc: Context-aware recording that synthesizes meetings into actionable tasks and strategic summaries.
products.esignDesc: AI-verified digital signatures that ensure document integrity and cross-platform compliance.
products.dlpDesc: High-stakes Data Loss Prevention designed by elite pentesters to safeguard proprietary intelligence.
products.dwhDesc: The 'Single Source of Truth' that ingests fragmented data from across the enterprise for instant analysis.
products.finDesc: Seamlessly integrates with existing finance systems to automate reconciliation and fiscal forecasting.
products.crmDesc: Moves beyond basic tracking to predict customer needs and automate high-value relationship building.

AboutNarrative.badge: Proud Member of Google for Startups
AboutNarrative.title: Bridging the fragmented <br class="hidden md:block" /> systems of tomorrow.
AboutNarrative.desc: We are a dedicated team of engineers, architects, and designers with a quiet ambition: to build software that simply works better together. Backed by the infrastructure and mentorship of the Google for Startups program, Vylera Labs is deeply focused on practical, high-impact AI developments. We don't believe in hype; we believe in unified architecture.
AboutNarrative.sec1Desc: Corporate infrastructure is often paralyzed by fragmented, disconnected tools. We are building the VyleraSuite to act as a unified, intelligent bridge. By bringing CRM, HRIS, and Data Warehousing under one neural roof, we allow businesses to stop managing software and start leveraging intelligence.
AboutNarrative.sec2Desc: The modern smart home is a mosaic of vulnerable, fragmented devices. We are deploying military-grade security architectures to the residential sector. Our goal is to unify environmental orchestration while ensuring absolute data sovereignty and protection for the individuals living within it.

TeamSection.title: The Architects of Vylera.
TeamSection.bioFounder: Former Security Analyst specializing in high-stakes penetration testing (Denuvo) and industrial Oracle architectures. Architecting the secure, sovereign neural fabric of Vylera.
TeamSection.bioCTO: Senior Systems Engineer with a background in SAP/ABAP architecture. Previously optimized mission-critical logistic networks for UNICEF. Building Vylera's reliable edge infrastructure.
TeamSection.bioCFO: A veteran of the Southeast Asian e-commerce ecosystem with high-growth leadership at JD.ID, Lazada, and Bluebird Group. Sandy architects Vylera’s financial infrastructure and capital strategy, ensuring our technical vision is grounded in robust fiscal discipline.
TeamSection.bioCOO: A specialist in embedded systems and hardware-software interoperability. Kristiyan leads the development of Vylera's physical layer, engineering custom IoT gateways and sensor arrays that bridge the digital Sovereign OS with the physical world at the edge.
